com.captiveimagination.jgn.event
Interface MessageSentListener

public interface MessageSentListener

MessageSentListener can be added directly to the MessageServer in order to receive events of sent messages.

Author:
Matthew D. Hicks

Field Summary
static int ALL
          The ALL listener mode will call any messageReceived method that this extension of Message can be cast as.
static int BASIC
          The BASIC listener mode simply calls the messageReceived(Message), this is a little bit faster than the other methods.
static int CLOSEST
          Cycles from top-most class down attempting to find the closest matching method to call.
 
Method Summary
 int getListenerMode()
           
 void messageSent(Message message)
          This method is called when a Message is sent.
 

Field Detail

BASIC

static final int BASIC
The BASIC listener mode simply calls the messageReceived(Message), this is a little bit faster than the other methods.

static final int ALL
The ALL listener mode will call any messageReceived method that this extension of Message can be cast as.

Method Detail

messageSent

void messageSent(Message message)
This method is called when a Message is sent.

Parameters:
message -

getListenerMode

int getListenerMode()
Returns:
The mode this listener corresponds to. Uses BASIC, ALL, or CLOSEST.
